description:
From our office in Albany, Georgia, the attorneys at the Dozier Law Firm provide invaluable advocacy and support to clients throughout Dougherty County and beyond who have suffered serious injuries or lost loved ones due to others' negligence or wrongdoing.

Based in Macon in 1966, our law firm has served the residents and businesses of our communities for more than 50 years. During this time, we have grown to include four total law offices across the state, and we have become one of Georgia's leading legal practices for all types of personal injury and wrongful death claims.

Over the course of our history, we have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff clients, earning memberships in the Million Dollar Advocates Forum and Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forum. We also handle workers' compensation and Social Security Disability claims as well as medical malpractice, nursing home abuse and other tortious matters. In addition, our law firm offers effective legal services in other areas, such as criminal defense, bankruptcy and business litigation.

Honored for our remarkable success, our lawyers have earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from our peers, including designation on The National Trial Lawyers: Top list and recognition as the best car accidents attorneys in Georgia from Expertise.

We have also received numerous testimonials and referrals from our highly satisfied clients, who praise us for the personalized attention and dedicated support we provide. To begin the process for yourself, you can contact the Dozier Law Firm by calling our office or visiting our website to schedule a free initial consultation. In an effort to help keep you safe and healthy in these uncertain times, we also offer virtual consultations.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the Bankruptcy Code.
